Here, at the side of the Dharma-transmitting ÄcÄrya at Qinglong Temple in Xinchangfang, Left Street, Chang'an City, in the great Tang country.ğŸ”½The original copies have been requested, copied, and collated.
Here is a brief catalog.
On the fifteenth day of the eleventh month in the ninth year of the great Tang Dazhong era.
Recorded by the monk Enchin, who seeks the Dharma.
The above-mentioned mandalas and Dharma gates, etc.
The master is solely concerned with being correct.
Personally inspecting and examining.
One by one, in accordance with the Dharma.
No longer the same.
But fearing that later students may give rise to doubts.
Respectfully waiting.
The great ÄcÄrya who transmits the teachings.
Fortunately, please show me your name.
Forever as a basis.
Respectfully submitted by the disciple who transmits the teachings and all reverently receive the monk Enchin from the country of Japan.
On the fifteenth day of the seventh month in the ninth year of the Dajian era.
Entered the five-jar abhiá¹£eka of the MahÄkaruá¹‡ika GarbhadhÄtu.
Attained the bodhisattva of prajÃ±ÄpÄramitÄ.
Then received the complete teachings of the GarbhadhÄtu.
Again, on the third day of the tenth month.
Entered the five-division abhiá¹£eka of the VajradhÄtu.
Attained the bodhisattva of vajra-pÄramitÄ.
Then received the teachings of the VajradhÄtu Susiddhi and the yoga of various honored ones.
Nearly one hundred texts were completed.
Again, on the fifth day of the eleventh month.
Entered the abhiá¹£eka ritual arena for the position of great ÄcÄrya who transmits the five-division great teachings.
and attained the Maá¹‡á¸ala Bodhisattva.
The above-mentioned great virtuous one, Enchin,
has already received the study of dhÄraá¹‡Ä« and the supreme vehicle teachings.
He is proficient in all of them.
The meaning and eloquence of his questions and answers are inexhaustible.
It is approved that he can transmit and widely benefit those with karmic affinity.
This is the farewell.
I wish to see the Pure Land.
Take good care, take good care.
On the twenty-first day of the tenth month in the ninth year of Dajian.
The Åšramaá¹‡a who Transmits the Teachings of Qinglong.
The Great Virtuous One who Recites Mantras in the Former Changsheng Palace, Faquan.
The document is submitted to Enchin.
Take good care, take good care.
